welcome: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to ArchiveBot! ğŸ¤– Your Intelligent Personal Archive Assistant Core Features: ğŸ“¦ Universal Archiving - Text/Images/Videos/Documents/Links ğŸ·ï¸ Smart Tags - Auto-classification & tag extraction ğŸ¤– AI Enhanced - Summarization/Key points/Smart titles ğŸ” Powerful Search - Full-text/Tag filtering/Time range ğŸ’¾ Flexible Storage - Telegram channel + Database backup ğŸ“ Notes Management - Linked archives/Standalone/AI assist ğŸ—‘ï¸ Safe Operations - Trash bin/Backup/Export formats Quick Start: â€¢ Send any content to archive â€¢ Use #hashtags for custom tags â€¢ Send /help for complete command list Open Source: â­ GitHub: https://github.com/tealun/ArchiveBot Let's start archiving! ğŸš€
help: ğŸ“– Help Archive Content: â€¢ Send me any content directly â€¢ Add tags using #tag format â€¢ Forward messages to record source â€¢ Batch forwarding auto-aggregation Basic Commands: /start - Initialize bot /help - View this help /search (/s) <keyword> - Search archives /tags (/t) - View all tags /stats (/st) - View statistics /review - Archive review & stats /rand (/r) - Random review Notes: /note (/n) - Add note to archive /notes - View all notes Data Management: /trash - View trash bin /export - Export data (JSON/Markdown/CSV) /backup - Backup & restore database System Settings: /setting (/set) - Configure system /ai - AI status /language (/la) - Change language Search Tips: â€¢ Keyword: /s python â€¢ Tag: /s #tech â€¢ Combined: /s #tech python â€¢ Click results to jump to channel AI Features: â€¢ Smart summary generation â€¢ Auto extract key points â€¢ Tag suggestions (batch shared) â€¢ Intelligent categorization

Supported providers: OpenAI, Claude, Qwen
